text: Israeli backlash against Macron's push for Palestinian state gains momentum as hard-liners and Netanyahu accuse him of stirring up antisemitism. Decision galvanizes opposition to Palestinian statehood.
creator: Matthew Dalton

text: Weather interfered with SpaceX's ability to demonstrate its capability to overcome setbacks faced by its Starship prototype during a test launch on Monday night. The launch was scrubbed due to unfavorable weather conditions.
creator: Kenneth Chang

text: Pilots and gunners patrol Ukraine's skies to hunt down Russian attack-and-reconnaissance drones. Equipped with shotguns and rifles, they face a daunting task in taking down the high-tech drones.
creator: Alistair MacDonald

text: FoundHer House is an all-female hacker house in San Francisco where residents are creating a supportive community to build their start-ups, breaking the glass ceiling of A.I.
creator: Natallie Rocha and Christie Hemm Klok

text: The "Panama Playlists" exposed the Spotify listening habits of famous people and two journalists, highlighting the lack of privacy protection in their use of the platform.
creator: Mike Isaac and Kashmir Hill

text: At least 20 killed in Israeli strikes on Gaza hospital amid rising international condemnation and plans for new offensive.
creator: Dov Lieber

text:
Sure! Here is a 2-line summary of the article:

IBM and NASA have developed a digital twin of the sun to predict future solar storms with greater accuracy and speed than current systems. The tool uses AI to model the sun and can anticipate solar flares 16 percent more accurately and in half the time.
creator: Fernanda González

text: Scientists have identified the origin of an extraordinarily powerful outer-space radio wave, known as a fast radio burst (FRB), which was detected in March 2025 and was found to be as energetic as the sun but lasting only milliseconds.
creator: Jorge Garay

text: Climate change is spreading Legionnaire's disease to towns across the country, disproportionately affecting low-income communities. Once confined to New York, extreme heat is now increasing its prevalence.
creator: Dylan Scott

text: The magnetic constant determines the strength of magnetic fields and is essential for motors, generators, audio speakers, and our ability to see in the absence of light.
creator: Rhett Allain

text: Ismael “El Mayo” Zambada, the patriarch of Mexico’s Sinaloa cartel for 40 years, pleaded guilty to U.S. drug charges, admitting to smuggling tons of drugs into the country.
creator: José de Córdoba

text: Intel's downfall highlights the vulnerability of even the most powerful tech giants to shifting political winds and government intervention.
creator: Tripp Mickle and Don Clark

text: AI's creativity is an inevitable by-product of its architecture. Image generators mimic training data but also produce novel combinations of elements.
creator: Webb Wright

text: Top Chinese trade negotiator Li Chenggang is set to visit Washington for talks with U.S. officials, signifying a desire for regular dialogue between the two nations.
creator: Lingling Wei

text: xAI sues Apple and OpenAI over claims of app suppression
creator: Kate Conger
